title: Bug 17289 - Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When attempting to click on the first Combo, it does not take focus. However, if I drop down the combo list, it will take focus. This behavior is observed in Photon.
OB: When I click on the first Combo, it does not take focus.
EB: The focus caret should be in the first Combo labeled 'Host:'.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the application in Photon.
2. Find the first Combo labeled 'Host:'.
3. Click on the Combo and observe that it does not take focus.
